episode_event_general_nobori_kudari/6701:
It looks like we’ve somehow arrived at a station
we’ve never been to before.

Look at this island! It’s full of promising Trainers,
brimming with talent!
Bravo! What an excellent stop for us!

Indeed, Ingo. I like winning battles against
strong Trainers.

And even more than that, I like combinations of
different Pokémon!

It looks like we can have a lot of fun
battling here!
Bravo! Then our destination is set!
Hey, I wonder where those tracks lead.

Y’know, those tracks up on the mountain with the
cart and everything! How could you NOT be
curious about them?

I guess I am a little curious... Wanna check them
out and see where they take us?

Emmet! Let’s change tracks and embark on a
new route!

I have an idea that’s sure to make you
say “Bravo!”
episode_event_general_nobori_kudari/6801:
Some verrrry interesting
battles are about to start
on Pasio!
What sights will we see here?

We’re on Pasio—a junction where all sorts of
tracks converge! I’m going to enjoy being here!
